about_the_game:
A roguelite that takes you to the sieged victorian city of Lordskeep, a place of interest for mercenaries and scavengers alike. Liberate it and earn your share.

Gameplay features

  • Move through a procedurally generated city

  • Attack your enemies head on or outwit them by luring and hiding

  • Interactive items - dual wield anything, benefit from using it at the same time or throw it to avert your foes' attention

  • Meet distinguished characters to talk to and bargain with

  • Dynamic weather, seasons and day-night cycles

  • Fight alone or alongside your fellow mercenaries
